alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 7:26PM EDT until July 20 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Champaign County in west central Ohio... Southern Logan County in west central Ohio... Southwestern Union County in central Ohio... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bellefontaine, Urbana, West Liberty, North Lewisburg, De Graff, West Mansfield, Milford Center, Woodstock, Valley Hi, Zanesfield, Cable, Raymond, New Jerusalem, Pickrelltown, Lippincott, Middleburg, Springhills, Mingo, Pottersburg and Kennard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
